website_summaries.verdict: A glass bottle with a silicone sleeve gives you a safe drinking vessel with a grippy, protective coating.
pros: Filters water through depth and absorption methods
Filter lasts about 75 gallons, or 4 months of regular use
cons: Bottle leaks if the cap is not screwed on tight

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this from Amazon - can't trust Amazon to pack this well.
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle and its filter are great. I love how they feel in the hand, love the quality of the water. Problem is I ordered this from Amazon and I had to return both the original and the replacement as they both got here broken, so I just went to buy from the original seller instead.
customer_reviews.author: Aldric Giacomoni

customer_reviews.title: not perfect, but pretty close
customer_reviews.text: I hate the taste of the water at our house and didn't want to spend the $$ to install a permanent filter system in the bathroom just so I could brush my teeth. Bought this little guy and love it. I'll admit, it's a bit tricky to take meds with it because it requires more "sucking action" than a normal tumbler/straw (because of the filtering, I'm sure), but I realize that's not what it's intended for. Also, the glass makes it heavy. Not sure I'd want to haul it around but I guess if you're hiking around unfiltered water you might not have a choice. All in all, I'd recommend. it.
customer_reviews.author: math-terpieces

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and love the glass
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can use water at work and filter it clean of extra things in it that I don't want.I just wish you could bottle was little bigger because the filter takes up a large part of the bottle so you don't have very much water in it so I have to keep refilling it.I don't know how long the filter will last but I will buy some extra ones just in case since I have to refill the bottle so often.otherwise I think it's a good product and does what it needs to do in filtering the water.
customer_reviews.author: ALOHA ROSIE

customer_reviews.title: No durability - what’s the point?
customer_reviews.text: I carried this water bottle in my purse for one day after receiving it in the mail. Within hours the glass had already cracked from contact during normal handling of my purse. What is the use of a water bottle with zero durability? As others have cautioned, this is an extremely delicate item. Would only recommend if you plan on keeping it in one place always. I like the brand and have purchased their stainless steel water bottle instead but am still trying to be refunded for the useless glass bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Escape Water Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I got this water bottle, so I could stop buying Water in bottles and putting them in trash. The ESCAPE WATER BOTTLE is WONDERFUL. The Flavor is just like Spring Water !!! I was drinking about 4 16oz Zephyrhills water bottles every day. NO MORE WATER BOTTLES IN THE TRASH !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Oeffner

customer_reviews.title: Cracked.
customer_reviews.text: I received this product 3 days ago. It has a crack, I am aware it is made of glass, so I have been careful with it, so I'm not sure if it happened during shipping or during these past 3 days of use. The water taste more fresh when cool, and the sucking straw is decent. Wish it has more of a protective layer. I would recommend having a plastic bottle covering the glass one rather than the rubber, so it is completely protected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaky
customer_reviews.text: These bottles are beautiful and do a fantastic job of filtering water, but they leak pretty badly. The lid does not properly seal, and even with minimal movement somehow water drips out. It's unfortunate that they have this problem, because otherwise they would be perfect. Instead, I spent $100 on two that will probably not be used because both leak significantly.
customer_reviews.author: Raychel Bennet

customer_reviews.title: Poor Durability, Great Customer Care
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I was so excited about it. I had broken the first one by accident and contacted the company with the receipt and they had replaced it with a new one no questions asked. I had them broke it while at work near the computer. I feel that with my clumsiness and the not good durability that we are not a match.
customer_reviews.author: Samara Lee-Marzo

customer_reviews.title: Needed in every home !!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product !! Easy easy to use !!! Every home should have one ...... in case of emergency or just day to day use ... we have to look out for our health and this is a great start
customer_reviews.author: Kim Staub

customer_reviews.title: Economical!
customer_reviews.text: I use this water bottle every night at work and refill it multiple times. I love this. Saves the landfill. I put a smaller straw in the mouth piece to make it easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: tracie talany

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: I bought this water bottle for my boyfriend for work because he couldn’t stand the well-water at work. He’s been using it pretty consistently for a couple weeks now. He even uses it at home. The filter definitely filters out some unwanted tastes from both well and city water. I’m honestly hinking about buying one of these for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra King

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle. It works just as described. However, because the rubber sleeve is wrapped around the base, it doesn’t stand very well. Mine fell over within the first day or two and cracked on an unprotected area, too badly to use again. Filters well and removes all taste, but you have to mind the glass. Edit: Their customer service is excellent and they took care of this issue for me with no trouble. Thanks Epic!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan C.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent buy

But this has gotten me away from drinking so much bottled water, even though the taste isn’t as desirable as purified bottled water. But it gets me through.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like the top of the bottle

The plastic covering should probably cover the entire glass surface

Really disappointed.

product_meta.title: Escape Glass Filtered Water Bottle | 24oz | American Made Filter Removes Chemicals, Lead, PFOA, PFOS, Chromium 6, VOC, Giardia, Cryptosporidium & 99.99% of Tap Water Contaminants | BPA Free
feature_bullets: ★ PROTECTED GLASS: Protective silicone sleeve provides durability and a non-slip gripping surface. Dishwasher safe (place cap on top rack/no need to remove silicone sleeve), Bisphenol A (BPA), phthalate, PVC, polycarbonate-free and 100-Percent non-toxic, Filter made in the USA & product assembled in the United States

★ NO HEAVY METALS OR BPS LEACHING: Our glass bottles offer a pure taste with no leaching from plastics or metals found in other bottles. Stainless bottles have been shown in studies to leach Iron, Chromium and Nickel from both new and old bottles at dangerous levels. Make the switch to glass today!

★ MULTI-STAGE FILTRATION PROCESS: The Escape Glass Filtered Water uses depth & adsorption filtration to achieve 1 micron contaminant removal. Adsorption removes particulates via the activated coconut carbon fiber mesh surface areas, which adsorbs contaminants such as heavy metals, chemicals, pharmaceuticals, and herbicides as they pass by. Depth filtration (6mm thick) involves the removal of suspended waste products as they try to pass through the thousands of layers of coconut carbon fiber.

♻ NO MORE EXPENSIVE PLASTIC WATER BOTTLES: Epic Escape Glass Filtered Water Bottle saves the Earth over 550 plastic water bottles from our landfills and oceans. This eco-friendly organic coconut shell based carbon filter is an environment friendly filtration media that is approved by National Science Foundation standards.
